1.name: Wanderer Black Hiking Boots
1.description: Daybird's Wanderer Hiking Boots in sleek black are perfect for all your outdoor adventures. These boots are made with a waterproof leather upper and a durable rubber sole for superior traction. With their cushioned insole and padded collar, these boots will keep you comfortable all day long.
